experiences.title: Listiee
experiences.subtitle: Full Stack Developer Intern
details: Listiee is a startup that aims to create a universal listing platform where people can find and share great lists of things.
Worked on improvement and optimization of existing features and adding new features to the platform
Developed custom URL Shortener and integrated with platform analytics and added middleware to keep track of traffic sources and analysis.
Take care of merging the codes of all developers and deployment to Digitalocean.

experiences.title: DSC KIET
experiences.subtitle: Core Team Member
details: Developer Student Clubs KIET powered by Google Developers is an initiative to learn, share and get productive using various cutting-edge technologies.
I am a Core Team Member and work on various community projects.

experiences.title: Angrybaaz Service Pvt. Ltd.
experiences.subtitle: Backend Developer Intern
details: Developed Backend for a bulk e-commerce platform.
Implemented online payment gateway, automated emails, multiple user-role management
Used cost-effective services like Firebase for image upload, Netlify and Heroku for deployements
